metadata.title: CVE-2023-52436 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: explicitly null-terminate the xattr listWhen setting an xattr, explicitly null-terminate the xattr list.  Thiseliminates the fragile assumption that the unused xattr space is alwayszeroed.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
